hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "The saying 'Subhan Allah' is for men and clapping is for women." (If something happens in the prayer, the men can invite the attention of the Imam by saying "Subhan Allah". And women, by clapping their hands)

chapter.eng-name: Clapping [during the Salat] is permissible only for the women
